House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05187
FULL TITLE : AN ACT OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE INTERNET GAMBLING REGULATORY ACT OF 2017
ABSTRACT : Aims to regulate online gaming by creating a regulatory Board which shall promulgate and adopt rules and regulations to govern Internet gaming; Also requires for an independent testing and certification standards for internet games and internet gaming devices and associated equipment; Provides for internet gaming account credits and payment and prohibits minors (under 18 yrs. old)from engaging in online gambling.
